featureFlags.name: Layouts
featureFlags.description: Layouts for WP Property. When enabled, disabled legacy Sidebars and PHP Templates.

featureFlags.name: Legacy widgets
featureFlags.description: Enable to use legacy widgets

featureFlags.name: Setup Assistant
featureFlags.description: Automated setup assistant.

featureFlags.name: Settings Backups
featureFlags.description: Enables automaic backups of the WP-Property settings. Backups stored in [wpp_property_backups] option.

featureFlags.name: Settings Version 2
featureFlags.description: This feature flag enables faster saving of developer tab's attributes.

featureFlags.name: Disable Editor
featureFlags.description: Disables native WordPress post editor.

featureFlags.name: Listing Policies
featureFlags.description: Sets listing display permissions, stored in [wpp_listing_policy].

featureFlags.name: Schools Standard Taxonomy
featureFlags.description: Adds standard taxonomy for schools as [wpp_schools].

featureFlags.name: Listing Labels
featureFlags.description: Property flags, for highlighting important information, stored in [wpp_listing_label]. Can be used to identify 'featured' properties.

featureFlags.name: Standard Location Taxonomy
featureFlags.description: Standard property location taxonomy, stored in [wpp_location].

featureFlags.name: Advanced Rewrite Rules
featureFlags.description: Improved rewrite rules.

featureFlags.name: Landing Page Categories
featureFlags.description: Dynamic terms for landing pages, stored in [wpp_listing_category].

featureFlags.name: Standard Property Type
featureFlags.description: Standard property type taxonomy, stored in [wpp_listing_type].

featureFlags.name: Standard Property Status
featureFlags.description: Standard property status taxonomy [wpp_listing_status].

featureFlags.name: Rooms
featureFlags.description: Adds UI for adding standard rooms.

featureFlags.name: Categorical Taxonomy
featureFlags.description: Taxonomy for general property terms, stored in [wpp_categorical]

featureFlags.name: Field Aliases
featureFlags.description: Meta aliases for WP-Property.

featureFlags.name: Meta Attributes
featureFlags.description: Legacy Meta fields. In v2.2.1 meta fields have been merged with attributes. This includes default Phone Number.

featureFlags.name: Legacy Attribute Input Types
featureFlags.description: Enables legacy input types such as radio, wysiwyg, etc.

featureFlags.name: Enable Settings Search
featureFlags.description: Search settings.

featureFlags.name: Standard Attributes Matching and Terms
featureFlags.description: Enable Standard Attributes Matching and Terms.

featureFlags.name: Legacy Taxonomies
featureFlags.description: Enable legacy [property_features] and [community_features] taxonomies. These have been replaced by [wpp_categorical].

featureFlags.name: RETSCI Client
featureFlags.description: Integrated WP-RETS Client plugin

address.label: l10n.address
address.notice: This attribute will be used for automatic geolocation.
